alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 9:51AM CST until February 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...South Clearwater, Mahnomen, North Clearwater, East Polk and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
